name: Curse io (opoly)
description:
For anyone who is searching for a remedy to reduce stress, play Curse io. Curse io is a spell-bindingly fun game that mixes all the aspects of MAGIC. Trade different conditions, potions and spells as you play a strategic opoly-style game based on the wonders of MAGIC.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
